db:select.doc:name: Select CATALOG
db:select.db:sql: SELECT ALBUM.TITLE AS ALBUM_NM, ALBUM.PUBLICATION_DT AS ALBUM_PUBLISH, SONG.SONG_TITLE, SONG.GENRE AS SONG_GENRE, SONG.DURATION AS SONG_DURATION, ARTIST.GROUP_NM, ARTIST.LAST_NM AS ARTIST_LAST, ARTIST.FIRST_NM AS ARTIST_FIRST, DATE_FORMAT(ARTIST.BIRTH_DATE, "%Y-%m-%d") AS ARTIST_BIRTH, ifnull(ARTIST.DEATH_DATE,"") AS ARTIST_DEATH FROM BC_ALBUM ALBUM LEFT OUTER JOIN BC_ARTIST ARTIST ON ALBUM.GROUP_NM = ARTIST.GROUP_NM LEFT OUTER JOIN BC_SONG SONG ON SONG.ARTIST_NM = ARTIST.GROUP_NM WHERE ARTIST.GROUP_NM LIKE :groupName GROUP BY ALBUM_NM, SONG_TITLE, ARTIST_LAST ORDER BY ALBUM_NM, SONG_TITLE, ARTIST_LAST
